trans-unit.source: Specifies the types of input and output streams used to load and save data in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Specifica i tipi di flussi di input e outpui utilizzati per caricare e salvare dati di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration when calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare i membri di questa enumerazione quando si chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>metodi di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: A plain text stream that includes spaces in places of Object Linking and Embedding (OLE) objects.
trans-unit.target: Un flusso di testo normale che include spazi al posto degli oggetti Object Linking and Embedding (OLE).

trans-unit.source: A Rich Text Format (RTF) stream with spaces in place of OLE objects.
trans-unit.target: Flusso RTF (RICH Text Format) con spazi al posto di oggetti OLE.

trans-unit.source: This value is only valid for use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile*> method of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore è valido solo per uso con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile*>metodo il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile*>

trans-unit.source: A plain text stream with a textual representation of OLE objects.
trans-unit.target: Un flusso di testo normale con una rappresentazione testuale di oggetti OLE.

trans-unit.source: This value is only valid for use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile*> method of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore è valido solo per uso con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile*>metodo il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile*>

trans-unit.source: A text stream that contains spaces in place of Object Linking and Embedding (OLE) objects.
trans-unit.target: Un flusso di testo che contengono spazi al posto di oggetti Object Linking and Embedding (OLE).

trans-unit.source: The text is encoded in Unicode.
trans-unit.target: Il testo è codificato in formato Unicode.
